All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AjaxDBChange
Class gathering sizes of articles and likes table along with the newest modificationAt date and refreshed authors names list.
Article
A JPA entity class having the ability to represent Articles' objects in the database.
ArticleRepository
Repository bean providing sophisticated CRUD functionality for managing Article entities.
ArticlesController
Controller handling articles' entities (insertions, modifications, removals).
BlogApplication
Start class.
CommentRepository
Repository bean providing sophisticated CRUD functionality for managing Comments entities.
Comments
A JPA entity class having the ability to represent Comments' objects in the database.
CommentsController
Controller handling articles' entities (insertions, modifications, removals).
CustomErrorController
Customized Spring MVC Error Controller.
PasswordMatches
Custom Bean validation annotation which logic relies on PasswordMatchValidator class.
PasswordMatchValidator
Custom validator verifying whether the passwords typed by user during registration match.
RefineResults
Class providing options list for article.html page.
RegistrationController
Users' registration controller.
RegistrationForm
Auxiliary class used for validation of input values typed by visitor attempting to sign up for the blog.
SecurityConfig
Spring Security Configuration Class.
User
A JPA entity class having the ability to represent Users' objects in the database.
UserRepository
Repository bean providing sophisticated CRUD functionality for managing User entities.
UserService
Auxiliary service methods for RegistrationController.
WebConfig
Customization of the Java-based configuration for Spring MVC.
